DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Mental Health Cognitive Function Version 2.0 PC36r Past Week Have to Work Harder than Usual to Keep Track of What I Was Doing Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how often in the past seven days they have had to work harder than usual to keep track of what they were doing, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Mental Health Domain Cognitive Function Past Week Have to Work Harder than Usual to Keep Track of What I Was Doing Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's mental health._The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess perceived difficulties in intellectual processes, capabilities, and deficits._The most recent week, including today._A question about whether an individual has or had to work harder than usual to keep track of what they were doing._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Property.preferredName: Past Week Have to Work Harder than Usual to Keep Track of What I Was Doing Score

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.longName: Have to Work Harder than Usual to Keep Track of What I Was Doing
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual has or had to work harder than usual to keep track of what they were doing.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.preferredName: PROMIS Cognitive Function Score 5 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes with ranges from 1 Very often (Several times a day) to 5 Never on a 5-point Likert scale.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

Concepts.definition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer that something occurs frequently.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer that something occurs frequently.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: On most occasions, or in most situations.

Concepts.definition: On most occasions, or in most situations.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ReferenceDocuments.name: I have had to work harder tha
ReferenceDocuments.description: I have had to work harder than usual to keep track of what I was doing

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Scoring and Interpretation Link
ReferenceDocuments.description: The URL citation is provided so that caDSR users can obtain materials related to instructions for administering and/or scoring the measure.
